p: The clinical, epidemiological and demographic information (day of onset of symptoms, description of symptoms, clinical suspicion of CHIKV or DENV infection, age, sex, district of residence, district of employment) was obtained from the epidemiological notification form and when available from the patientsÂ´ clinical records. The spatial and geographical location of each confirmed CHIKV case was represented using ArcGIS software v.10.3.
